# minimum: 0.001000000333333466666720634942504418034314959774193385492
#    type: hand solved + WolframAlpha
#   input: x=0.001

# maximum: 6.7129325417501171627480790905877998982844769558532501e10
#    type: hand solved + WolframAlpha
#   input: x=1.57079632678

-f "tan(x)"
-i "{'x' : (.001, 1.57079632678)}"
